state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, move north. And then, make an attempt to head west. Then, make an effort to venture north. Then, move east. And then, venture east. Okay, and then, attempt to venture south. Then, go south. Once you do that, try to move east. Then, venture south. Okay, and then, travel west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip north. And then, make an attempt to move east. Then, head south. After that, go west. Following that, pick-up the coin from the floor of the office. Got that? Good! -= Salon =- You arrive in a salon. An ordinary one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Salon =-0/1
